components.html: Fields marked with a red asterisk "*" are required.
components.label: Text/Images
Are you requesting a site registry search?

components.html: If you have already carried out a site registry search using BC OnLine, the ministry does not need to repeat that search for you.
components.label: Text/Images

values.label: Site-specific - for information about one specific site
Area search - provides a list of all sites in the site registry within a specified geographical area

components.html: It is recommended that at least two parameters listed below be provided to ensure the most comprehensive search for a specific site.
components.label: Text/Images

values.label: Site synopsis report - an overview with limited information about a selected site
Site details report - all details of a selected site
Small area search – 0.5 km radius from the coordinates provided
Large area search – 5.0 km radius from the coordinates provided

components.label: Are you requesting a custom site registry report?
Briefly describe the details of your request

values.label: Custom report of site registry information
Scheduled update to previously completed custom report

components.html: Use this service to request documents relating to sites listed in the site registry.
components.label: Text/Images
Are you requesting documents related to a site?

components.html: To retrieve documents you must have previously completed a site registry search under Section 2 or completed your own search using BC OnLine. Provide the following information:
components.label: Text/Images
Provide the title, date and author of the document you wish to obtain. If you are requesting more than one document, select the "Add Another" button.

components.html: Fees are in accordance with the Contaminated Sites Regulation and applicable provisions of the Financial Administration Act.
components.label: Text/Images

components.html: You will be invoiced for applicable fees, plus 5% GST. Do not submit payment with your request.
components.label: Text/Images
Text/Images

components.html: In accordance with Schedule 3 of the Contaminated Sites Regulation, the fees listed above include the applicable $10 surcharge.
